edu.psu.compbio.seqcode.gse.projects.readdb
Class ByteBP

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.compbio.seqcode.gse.projects.readdb.ByteBP
Direct Known Subclasses:
FloatBP, IntBP
public class ByteBP
extends java.lang.Object

Ancestor class for wrappers that combine a ByteBuffer and a view of the ByteBuffer such as an IntBuffer. We need this combination because some methods are most convenient on the view (eg, IntBuffer.get() is much better than ByteBuffer.getInt because it reduces the chance of making mistakes with the index) but sometimes you need the ByteBuffer too, for example, when sending across the network. BP = buffer pair
